org.araneaframework.core.util
Class ProxiedHandlerUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.core.util.ProxiedHandlerUtil
public abstract class ProxiedHandlerUtil
extends Object

Utility class for accessing methods that will be invocation targets of ProxyEventListener and ProxyActionListener.

Since:
1.0.12
Author:
Taimo Peelo (taimo@araneaframework.org)
